home.description: In today's digital environment, companies need adaptable web applications. As a full-stack developer, I design specialized and reliable solutions. Explore my portfolio to discover how I can drive the success of your business.

contactInfo.title: Contact
contactInfo.content: If you want more information about my projects and services, feel free to contact me using the contact form or through my social media. I am available to answer your questions and provide the information you need.

inputName.title: Please enter only letters or spaces

contentDialog.title: Message sent successfully
contentDialog.text: I will review your information and get in touch with you shortly. Thank you.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Merging Technological Passion with Creative Inspiration
aboutInfo: Passionate about technology and creativity fueled by science fiction. I find inspiration in electronic music to solve problems with a fresh approach.
My experience as an avid traveler has provided me with a global and holistic perspective in tackling challenges.
I seek to apply this amalgamation of experiences to contribute to innovative solutions. I am excited to collaborate and take your ideas to new horizons.

education.title: My Educational Journey
education.subtitle: Building Knowledge with Passion and Discipline

project.title: Explore My Achievements
project.subtitle: Visual and Functional Innovation in Every Project.

projects.title: Free Certify - Open Source Project
projects.content: Free-Certify is a full-stack project developed with the MERN stack. It is an open-source project on which I have been working as a freelancer. Its main goal is to simplify the mass and free generation of certificates.

projects.title: Intedsur - Electrical Services Company
projects.content: Intedsur is a frontend development project in collaboration with a UI/UX designer. It is a simple project created for a specific client, focusing solely on the visual aspect and user experience.

projects.title: Inventra - Intelligent Inventory Management
projects.content: Inventra is a full-stack project developed with the MERN stack. Its main goal is to simplify and streamline inventory management. This comprehensive solution covers everything from data storage to the user interface, allowing efficient and detailed inventory management.

projects.title: CookMeal - AI-Generated Cooking Recipes
projects.content: CookMeal is an application that uses technologies like React, Tailwind, and Next.js on the frontend, along with MongoDB, Mongoose, Express, and Node.js on the backend. Its focus is on generating recipes through the OpenAI API, providing a unique and delicious culinary experience.

projects.title: Verbify - English Educational Platform
projects.content: Verbify is an educational platform focused on English courses, known for its interactive learning approach. It uses technologies like React, Next.js, and CSS on the frontend to provide a smooth user experience. In the backend, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB are employed for efficient data management and API creation, ensuring scalable storage.

service.title: Full Stack Web Development Services
service.subtitle: Boost your online presence with our specialized solutions

services.title: Customized Websites
services.content: We create custom websites that perfectly fit your needs. We take care of both the visual appearance and internal functionality, ensuring that your online presence stands out.

services.title: Mobile Applications for Everyone
services.content: We develop mobile applications that work on both iOS and Android. With advanced technology like React Native, we create efficient and attractive mobile experiences for your users.

services.title: Seamless Connection
services.content: We facilitate communication between different parts of your application, ensuring everything runs smoothly. We design and develop efficient interfaces that connect the user side with the engine of your application.

services.title: Efficient Data Storage
services.content: We implement databases that store and manage data efficiently. Using technologies like MongoDB, we ensure robust and scalable solutions for managing your application's information.

services.title: Web Security and Protection
services.content: We care about the security of your web applications. We employ advanced secure development practices and conduct thorough testing to protect you against potential vulnerabilities and ensure the integrity of your data.

testimonial.title: Shared Experiences
testimonial.subtitle: Discover what others say about working with me

testimonials.name: Elizabeth León
testimonials.testimonial: Max's work is incredible! He consistently exceeds my expectations and delivers high-quality results. I would recommend him without hesitation.

testimonials.name: Yenifer Ramírez
testimonials.testimonial: I highly recommend Max with gratitude. His initiative and ability to deliver exceptional work always impress. Having him as a Project Manager was a real plus for our team.

testimonials.name: Cristian Gomez
testimonials.testimonial: Working with Max was a wonderful experience. He is a friendly professional always willing to listen. I would definitely be delighted to work with him again in the future.

testimonials.name: Erik Perez
testimonials.testimonial: Max is an exceptional talent in web development. His ability to work on both the front-end and back-end is impressive. He always meets deadlines and produces high-quality code.

testimonials.name: Lorenzo Rueda
testimonials.testimonial: Max is a highly competent developer. His technical skills and problem-solving ability are exceptional. He always finds effective solutions and delivers quality results.

testimonials.name: Lucia Pinna
testimonials.testimonial: Max is a very talented developer. His ability to understand both design and technical implementation is impressive. Working with him has always been a smooth and productive experience.

testimonials.name: Dario Elguero
testimonials.testimonial: I have had the pleasure of collaborating with Max on several development projects. His knowledge and skills as a developer are outstanding. He always brings solid technical solutions and meets project requirements.

testimonials.name: Adlai Bermejo
testimonials.testimonial: I dare to recommend Max, as he is a professional completely dedicated to his goals. He works on his skills every day, easily adapts to different processes, and his improvement is noticeable in short periods. He is a great developer standout within his generation.
